p:
Upon collection, all samples were placed in a cooler with ice elements and subsequently transferred to − 20 °C until analysis. Subsamples for eDNA metabarcoding were taken on site and transferred to 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes using clean, single use, spatulas. The outer layer of each faeces was gently removed and samples were taken from the inner part of the faeces to reduce environmental contamination, as recommended elsewhere
36, 39 . The remaining faecal sample was transferred to plastic bags for macroscopic diet analysis.
